task: Write a Python function that extracts the AWS account ID from an ARN string (e.g., 'arn:aws:s3:::my-bucket' or 'arn:aws:ec2:us-east-1:123456789012:instance/i-1234567890abcdef0')
Create a JSON object that represents an AWS IAM policy allowing read-only access to a specific S3 bucket named 'my-data-bucket'
Write a regular expression that matches valid AWS S3 bucket names (3-63 characters, lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only, must start and end with a letter or number)
